Installation instructions
=========================


Install via Anaconda
--------------------

.. note::
  If you do not have Anaconda, please follow the `instructions here
  <https://www.continuum.io/downloads>`_ to install it, or scroll down for
  manual installation of lightcurve.

After you have anaconda setup, then you can install lightcurve by
specifying the channel in your install command::

    $ conda install --channel justincely lightcurve


Install vi pip
--------------

If you have pip installed::

    $ pip install lightcurve


Install from source
-------------------

Refstis can also be installed manually using the source code::

    $ git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/lightcurve.git
    $ cd lightcurve
    $ python setup.py install
